title: JSON schema for batect configuration files

project_name.description: The name of your project. Used to label any images built.

containers.description: Definitions for each of the containers that make up your various environments

image.description: Image name (in standard Docker image reference format) to use for this container

build_directory.description: Path (relative to the configuration file's directory) to a directory containing a Dockerfile to build and use as an image for this container

command.description: Command to run when the container starts

environment.description: List of environment variables (in `name=value` format) for the container

working_directory.description: Working directory to start the container in

volumes.description: List of volume mounts to create for the container

ports.description: List of ports to make available to the host machine

dependencies.description: List of other containers that should be started and healthy before starting this container

health_check.description: Overrides health check configuration specified in the image or Dockerfile

tasks.description: Definitions for each of your tasks, the actions you launch through batect

dependencies.description: List of other containers that should be started and healthy before starting the task container given in `run`

prerequisites.description: List of other tasks that should be run before running this task

taskRunOptions.description: Specifies what to do when this task starts

container.description: Container to run for this task

command.description: Command to run for this task

environment.description: List of environment variables (in `name=value` format) to pass to the container, in addition to those defined on the container itself

ports.description: List of port mappings to create for the container, in addition to those defined on the container itself

working_directory.description: Working directory to start the container in

local.description: Port on the host machine to map

container.description: Port inside the container to map

local.description: Path on the host machine to mount

container.description: Path inside the container to mount the host path at

options.description: Docker volume mount options to use when creating mount

retries.description: The number of times to perform the health check before considering the container unhealthy

interval.description: The interval between runs of the health check. Accepts values such as `2s` (two seconds) or `1m` (one minute).

start_period.description: The time to wait before failing health checks count against the retry count. The health check is still run during this period, and if the check succeeds, the container is immediately considered healthy. Accepts values such as `2s` (two seconds) or `1m` (one minute).

enabled.description: Set to `true` to enable 'run as current user' mode
Set to `true` to enable 'run as current user' mode

home_directory.description: Directory to use as home directory for user inside container.
